title: Cognitive Load Optimization Strategies Using 3D Anatomy E-Learning Tools (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Anatomy Terminology and Understanding of Human Body Structure
context.additional_context: Parallel smartphone-based learning and offline workshops, including anatomy terminology translation projects for language domain application

learning_goals: Learners can manipulate more than ten major human anatomical structures in 3D using basic functions of 3D anatomy tools
Learners can quantitatively analyze their cognitive load levels through dual-task methodology (anatomical learning + cognitive load measurement)
Learners can write term translation guidelines and comparative learning effectiveness reports using 3D anatomy tools through project-based assessment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
